alert.note: Alert for Brewster (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 27 at 10:00PM CDT until May 29 at 10:14PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Midland/Odessa TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Rio Grande at Castolon affecting Brewster County. Rio Grande at Boquillas affecting Brewster County. Rio Grande at Johnson Ranch affecting Brewster County. For the Rio Grande...including Presidio 6WNW, Presidio International Bridge, Presidio 5SE, Castolon, Johnson Ranch, Boquillas, Dryden 16S, Terlingua 8S...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rio Grande at Boquillas. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet (3.7 meters), the river reaches bankfull, and no damage is expected. Preparations may be necessary to remove water pumps. The park should be notified at this time if additional rises are expected so they will have time to remove the pumps. At 13.0 feet (4.0 meters), the river reaches minor flood stage. Water reaches the water pumps maintained by the park service that are used to water the campgrounds and to provide water to the employee living quarters. It may be necessary for park personnel to remove the pumps. At 15.0 feet (4.6 meters), the river reaches moderate flood stage. Water pumps submerge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 7.5 feet (2.3 meters). - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 13.5 feet (4.1 meters) tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet (4.0 meters). - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Below are the latest river stages and forecasts (feet): Fld Observed Sun Sun Sun Sun Location Stg Stg Day/Time 1am 7am 1pm 7pm Rio Grande Boquillas 13.0 7.5 Sat 9pm 11.2 13.5 11.8 9.2 Below are the latest river stages and forecasts (meters): Fld Observed Sun Sun Sun Sun Location Stg Stg Day/Time 1am 7am 1pm 7pm Rio Grande Boquillas 4.0 2.3 Sat 9pm 3.4 4.1 3.6 2.8 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 1000 AM CDT.
